title: MTV's Ghosted: Love Gone Missing
overview: MTV's Ghosted: Love Gone Missing, will follow two people -- the ghosted and the ghost -- as they try to uncover the truth behind those unanswered messages. America's Bachelorettesweetheart Rachel Lindsay and recording artist Travis Mills will serve as hosts; in the eight-episode docuseries, the two will help distraught individuals track down and confront a former lover, friend, or family member in an effort to uncover the harsh realities of why they "ghosted" them.
